metadataAttributes.Title: Market Research Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Gain key skills essentials in market research. Learn to plan, execute and analyse a research project
metadataAttributes.Skills: Use qualitative and quantitative research methodologies, Manage the development and use of different research instruments, Analyse and interpret data, Develop a research proposal, Familiarise with the essentials of market research, Identify and formulate the research needs, Understand the research process, Reflect on the development of the research proposal, Collect primary and secondary data, Adopt different sampling approaches, Evaluate different data collection approaches, Refine research instruments,
